dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1958
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Decries the city's eviction order and describes their futile search for a new house of hospitality. Tells of two weddings and four deaths during the month.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 742 1958-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
